name: NamePlaceAnimalRapidFire
0: ”Alexa open name place animal rapid fire”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: name place animal rapid fire
des:
It is a simple rapid fire round where Alexa picks a random alphabet and expects the audience to say either name, place or animal starting with the chosen alphabet. The player is provided with few lifelines.

This game will help in engaging kids with their family and friends and probably urge them to explore and find different names, animals and places.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
